nodes.text: The Lost Twenty: Dooku's Rise was a book for sale in 23 BBY that concerned Count Dooku, a Jedi Master who resigned from the Jedi Order and went on to help found a militant confederacy of planets that wished to secede from the Galactic Republic. It was authored, without permission from proper parties, by Professor H. Hrush and was, for a time, the second best-selling book according to the CoCo Town Edition of the HoloNet News.

A ranking of the five best-selling books from 23 BBY, including the number two ranked The Lost Twenty, appeared in HoloNet News Vol. 531 45 an in-universe website created to publicize the upcoming Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones film and released in March 2002. Pablo Hidalgo and Paul Ens wrote the site content.
